name: AIR PULL AVIATION, S.L.
about: Airpull Aviation Academy, located at Requena Airport in Valencia, Spain, is a renowned flight school with 20 years of experience in professional and recreational pilot training. As an Approved Training Organization (ATO) certified by EASA, we offer a comprehensive range of programs including Private Pilot License (PPL), Commercial Pilot License (CPL), Airline Transport Pilot License (ATPL), and various instructor certifications. Our fleet includes Cessna and Piper aircraft, and we boast an own aerodrome and student dorm, ensuring uninterrupted training. Awarded the "Best Spanish Flight School 2023" by Corporate Vision, our experienced instructors and state-of-the-art facilities provide an exceptional learning environment. We are committed to excellence in training, enabling students to become proficient pilots in record time.
